EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.A/B Testing.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform 2016 - last chance for early pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Early registration and training prices end April 15th at 11:59pm pacific time
Register now <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]> to save $300.00! We have over 225 submitted talks from top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives to choose from, so you can expect a great program. Don’t miss this unique opportunity to get involved in the conversation around transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2016.
Pre-conference training July 31—Aug 1st
Pivotal Education offers a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne Platform conference. Early ticket prices for training also expire April 15th, so register now for in-depth training on some of the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies and save $50.00!
Developing Applications with Cloud Foundry <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#developing-applications-with-cloud-foundry]]> Building the Connected Car <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#building-the-connected-car]]> Spring Cloud Services <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-services]]> Spring Boot Primer <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-boot-primer]]>
See you there,
The Pivotal <[[pivotal.io]]> team
